name: Viz: The Soft Floppy One
summary: Viz: The Soft Floppy One, was a 1991 Amiga video game based on the British toilet humor comic, "Viz." It was mediocre multi-event olympics-style game featuring three very crude protagonists; the worst of which was a fellow named Buster Gonad who could bounce on his outrageously enlarged testicles.
